ctx: intros F FF f g h Hfg Hgh eps.

original: intros F FF f g h Hfg Hgh eps. unfold is_domin in *. intros x. specialize (Hfg x eps). specialize (Hgh x eps). intros Hfg' Hgh'. apply Hgh, Hfg. intros y. apply Rle_trans with (r2:=norm (g x) + norm (g y)). - apply norm_triangle. - apply Rplus_le_compat; apply Hfg'; apply Hgh'.
